info.name: Survey
info.summary: Create simple surveys for many different purposes. Inspired by Google Forms
info.description:
# Survey
Survey is an app that lets you easily create surveys with answers in the following formats
- short texts - long text - radio-buttons - checkboxes - selects
It is heavily inspired by [Google Forms](https://www.google.com/forms/) and the [Nextcloud Polls](https://github.com/nextcloud/polls)
info.author: Maximilian Stauss
